title: What are your most 'WTF' BTS lyrics? - Quora

response.answer_text: Oh, I love this question. Here’s my list: Literally all of Trouble from Jin and RM (You might wanna get holy water for this.) Suga’s line from Cypher Pt 1 (album: O!RUL8, 2?) So not only is Yoongi a wealthy housewife, but he’s also a boiler. This literally reminds me of that one time I told my friends I was as cool as an air conditioner. J-hope’s iconic line in Boy In Luv (album: Skool Luv Affair) I understand that it has to do with grades and college being easy due to the girl (thus the ABCs since that is easy and “hakuna matata” which means no worries), but this was still a weird way to portray it. Suga’s lines in Where Did You Come From? (album: Skool Luv Affair) Gee, thanks for the advice on pick up lines, Bangtan! You sure know how to get the girls with your amazing words, especially you, Yoongi.  This sounds like something my 6th grader self or an anime tsundere would say. V’s verse in the Boy in Luv Chinese Version    The whole song is really aggressive as Chinese, which makes it hilarious, but literally, when I showed this part to my Chinese ARMY friend, we both could not stop laughing at it. Half of the lyrics in there are “oppa”. If you haven’t seen this, you are missing out. RM’s verse in Look Here (album: Dark&Wild)   “Yo my genie Lamborghini be my teenie weenie mini” “You’re a bikini and martini, Mercedes so hot” “It’s too tiring stop that eenie menie why” I didn’t even understand the lyrics’ translation in English, but, you know, if I was a dude, I would totally use these as pick up lines on a girl. J-hope’s line in Boyz with Fun (album: HYYH Pt.1) … Hm, that sounds very fun. There are lots more of BTS’s “WTF?” lyrics out there, but these are the ones that stuck out to me like a sore thumb. I hope you laughed a little while reading this! Thanks for reading! <3

These are some pretty weird bts lyrics.. . Where did you come from? Yoongi - stop playing hard to get before I kick u in the butt, You look fresh like salad, so smooth ( I wanna know who wrote these lyrics imao) Jhope - *I will bite down on you first* ( WTF ) . Miss Right Namjoon - You were even born with sexy brain wrinkles, that makes me wanna party on your body ( seriously? ) . If I ruled the world Namjoon - music, turn it up, I'd pick my nose out of boredom ( now, this is so weird ) .War of Hormone Jungkook - Girls are like equation, us guys just do them.. ( don't wait kookie, just do them lol) . Beautiful Jungkook - She's my religion, so I can call u she-sus ( she-sus? What the hell is that? 😂 ) .Trouble Namjoon - I think you'd look gold in black stockings, girl don't flirt around other people ,you're my, you are my whole world Bitch ,I'll call u my another bitch ( WTF😂) .Cypher pt. 3 Yoongi - As you know my voice will turn u on, wheather it's a guy or girl ,my tongue will make you come ( 😶😶 ) Cypher pt. 2 .Yoongi - My erotic voice even seduce your girlfriend ( wth ) That’s all for now....... Bye.. I need holy water imao..
